Texts.Eng:
A really big sandwich pack. Like, big. Holy shit this thing is huge. Massive even. And it probably has to be, because there's not much in there besides the obligatory ingredients.
^orange;Type: Cooked Meat^reset; ^green;Veggie^reset; Dairy
Texts.Chs:
一个非常大的三明治包。像，大。天哪，这东西太大了。大规模甚至。这可能是必须的，因为除了必需的成分外，里面没有什么。
 ^orange;类型：熟肉^reset;^green;素食^reset;奶制品
